LanguageData.HorseshoesPin.label: horseshoes pin
LanguageData.HorseshoesPin.description: A simple ancient game played with a horseshoes and a large pin in the ground. Players toss horseshoes to try to get them to land on the pin. It's relaxing, and trains shooting skills.
LanguageData.HorseshoesPin_Blueprint.label: horseshoes pin (blueprint)
LanguageData.HorseshoesPin_Blueprint_Install.label: horseshoes pin (blueprint)
LanguageData.HorseshoesPin_Frame.label: horseshoes pin (building)
LanguageData.HorseshoesPin_Frame.description: A simple ancient game played with a horseshoes and a large pin in the ground. Players toss horseshoes to try to get them to land on the pin. It's relaxing, and trains shooting skills.
LanguageData.HoopstoneRing.label: hoopstone ring
LanguageData.HoopstoneRing.description: A simple ancient game played with stones and a large ring in the ground. Players try to toss stones through the ring from a distance. It's relaxing, and trains shooting skills.
LanguageData.HoopstoneRing_Blueprint.label: hoopstone ring (blueprint)
LanguageData.HoopstoneRing_Blueprint_Install.label: hoopstone ring (blueprint)
LanguageData.HoopstoneRing_Frame.label: hoopstone ring (building)
LanguageData.HoopstoneRing_Frame.description: A simple ancient game played with stones and a large ring in the ground. Players try to toss stones through the ring from a distance. It's relaxing, and trains shooting skills.
LanguageData.GameOfUrBoard.label: game-of-Ur board
LanguageData.GameOfUrBoard.description: Dating from 2500BC, this exciting yet infuriating board game can be played by one or two people. It trains intellectual skills.
LanguageData.GameOfUrBoard_Blueprint.label: game-of-Ur board (blueprint)
LanguageData.GameOfUrBoard_Blueprint_Install.label: game-of-Ur board (blueprint)
LanguageData.GameOfUrBoard_Frame.label: game-of-Ur board (building)
LanguageData.GameOfUrBoard_Frame.description: Dating from 2500BC, this exciting yet infuriating board game can be played by one or two people. It trains intellectual skills.
LanguageData.ChessTable.label: chess table
LanguageData.ChessTable.description: The ancient game of kings. Fun for a few hours here and there, even playing alone. It trains intellectual skills.
LanguageData.ChessTable_Blueprint.label: chess table (blueprint)
LanguageData.ChessTable_Blueprint_Install.label: chess table (blueprint)
LanguageData.ChessTable_Frame.label: chess table (building)
LanguageData.ChessTable_Frame.description: The ancient game of kings. Fun for a few hours here and there, even playing alone. It trains intellectual skills.
LanguageData.PokerTable.label: poker table
LanguageData.PokerTable.description: A table designed for playing gambling card games like poker. A great way to test your strategic skills and a bit of luck.
LanguageData.PokerTable_Blueprint.label: poker table (blueprint)
LanguageData.PokerTable_Blueprint_Install.label: poker table (blueprint)
LanguageData.PokerTable_Frame.label: poker table (building)
LanguageData.PokerTable_Frame.description: A table designed for playing gambling card games like poker. A great way to test your strategic skills and a bit of luck.
LanguageData.BilliardsTable.label: billiards table
LanguageData.BilliardsTable.description: A soft-topped bounded table for playing a variety of billiards-type games. It trains shooting ability.
LanguageData.BilliardsTable_Blueprint.label: billiards table (blueprint)
LanguageData.BilliardsTable_Blueprint_Install.label: billiards table (blueprint)
LanguageData.BilliardsTable_Frame.label: billiards table (building)
LanguageData.BilliardsTable_Frame.description: A soft-topped bounded table for playing a variety of billiards-type games. It trains shooting ability.
LanguageData.TubeTelevision.label: tube television
LanguageData.TubeTelevision.description: A cathode ray tube display for showing moving pictures with sound. Even on the rimworlds, there is often an old transmitter running something at least marginally interesting.
LanguageData.TubeTelevision_Blueprint.label: tube television (blueprint)
LanguageData.TubeTelevision_Blueprint_Install.label: tube television (blueprint)
LanguageData.TubeTelevision_Frame.label: tube television (building)
LanguageData.TubeTelevision_Frame.description: A cathode ray tube display for showing moving pictures with sound. Even on the rimworlds, there is often an old transmitter running something at least marginally interesting.
LanguageData.FlatscreenTelevision.label: flatscreen television
LanguageData.FlatscreenTelevision.description: A high-tech flat-screen television with crystal-clear image and rich color. Picks up transmissions from ancient satellites and ubiquitous data cards.
LanguageData.FlatscreenTelevision_Blueprint.label: flatscreen television (blueprint)
LanguageData.FlatscreenTelevision_Frame.label: flatscreen television (building)
LanguageData.FlatscreenTelevision_Frame.description: A high-tech flat-screen television with crystal-clear image and rich color. Picks up transmissions from ancient satellites and ubiquitous data cards.
LanguageData.MegascreenTelevision.label: megascreen television
LanguageData.MegascreenTelevision.description: A huge, high-tech television. Gigantic, hyper-vibrant images almost leap out of the screen. Very entertaining. Picks up transmissions from ancient satellites and ubiquitous data cards.
LanguageData.Telescope.label: telescope
LanguageData.Telescope.description: A telescope for doing amateur astronomy. It's a relaxing hobby for a certain kind of person. Can only be used outdoors.
LanguageData.Telescope_Blueprint_Install.label: telescope (blueprint)
